overview: On January 29, 1982, when the author of this story was one year eight months old, her brother Oswaldo died while doing military service. The military experts' verdict was: "accident due to a stray bullet". Since then, the family made a decision to confine his memory to oblivion. The documentary recounts this family's story, which is, at the same time, a facet of the country's history.
title: Bala perdida
